name: Macerated Fruit
keywords: almonds, dried fruit, pine nuts, dessert, fall
recipeIngredient: 2 pounds assorted dried fruit (apricots, figs, peaches, pears, prunes, raisins, apples or others)
1/2 cup pine nuts, slivered blanched almonds, unsalted pistachios or a mixture

recipeInstructions.text: Combine everything but the sour cream in a bowl, and add water to cover. Stir, and let sit at room temperature for at least 6 hours. The fruit is ready when it is soft and the liquid is syrupy.
To serve, put some fruit into a bowl, spoon a little of the syrup over it, and garnish with sour cream.
